title.rendered: Smile participates in the Mumbai Juniorthon for the second consecutive year

content.rendered:
The Mumbai Juniorthon is the first ever annual running event for children & junior athletes in Mumbai. Juniorthon is all about Mumbai children running towards a healthier future and supporting a good cause. The goal of Juniorthon is to encourage outdoor activities and physical fitness amongst children by giving them an opportunity to accomplish the goal of running. Around 3000 children participated in the event. The second annual running event for children & junior athletes in Mumbai, the Mumbai Juniorthon was flagged off by Ms. Claudia Ciesla, Ms. Preetika Rao and Dipannita Sharma.

Many celebrities from the B Town also participated in the event and supported the cause of children’s education. The funds raised through the event will be utilized for the cause of educating the lesser privileged.
